mapper.insert:
replace into resource_info (uuid, name, detail_url, magnet_uri, total_file_size, type, language, resolution, uploader, posted_time, remark) values
(#{data.uuid}, #{data.name}, #{data.detailUrl}, #{data.magnetUri}, #{data.totalFileSize}, #{data.type}, #{data.language}, #{data.resolution}, #{data.uploader}, #{data.postedTime}, #{data.remark})
